Improvements.Improvement: Avoid Null Pointer Exception in `isHidden` method
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- return measure.getHidden() != null && measure.getHidden();
+ return measure.getHidden() != null ? measure.getHidden() : false;
Improvements.Description: The current implementation might throw a Null Pointer Exception if measure.getHidden() is null. To avoid this, we can first check if measure.getHidden() is null before proceeding.

Improvements.Improvement: Avoid Null Pointer Exception in `value` method
Improvements.Description: The current implementation might throw a Null Pointer Exception if measure.getDefinition() is null. To avoid this, we can first check if measure.getDefinition() is null before proceeding.
